nodes.bodyText:
How about:
If {@code true}, an {@link HttpStatusException} will not be
{@linkplain ...#deferStatusException... deferred} and {@linkplain ... preflight request}
will not be handled by this {@link Route}.

RouteDecoratingService is an implementation detail; you're not supposed to mention it here. Javadoc will not hyperlink.
How about:
@param isRouteDecorator {@code true} if this method is called for route decorators. 
                        {@code false} if this method is called for services.
Better deprecating and removing all references to this method?
